Articles.Content: I’ve been watching a lot of science fiction shows with star fighters in them and curious which mission based space combat game would y’all recommend?
I’ve been consuming quite a bit of FTL lately.   Not sure if it’s exactly what you want, but it’s loads of fun.

4 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

I’ve been consuming quite a bit of FTL lately.   Not sure if it’s exactly what you want, but it’s loads of fun.  

I’ve been playing FTL a lot! More looking for ace combat style games.

I hear Star Wars Squadrons isn’t too shabby.   
 

But honestly, that style of space game hasn’t caught my eye in a couple decades.    My First thought was “Descent” and then “Parsec”, which are both old enough you’ll find it difficult to play one of them, and probably impossible for the the latter.

there is only one space sim i can recommend, and that is freespace. its not realistic, very ancient (use one of the source ports), but its good. 

Edited December 12, 2021 by Nuke

Children of a Dead Earth could be what you’re looking for- uses realistic physics for orbits etc. and delta-V is a key consideration so KSP skills can come in handy, also has a campaign mode with lots of different missions.
